summary: Encapsulates loading and preprocessing of forcing data files into an xarray dataset on its native grid, handling time selection, variable mapping, global or sub‑domain checks, dimension ordering, longitude concatenation, optional dask chunking, and post‑processing to produce a ready‑to‑use dataset.
business_intent: Provide model‑ready forcing data with consistent metadata and optional preprocessing, enabling efficient access and manipulation for climate, weather, or oceanic simulations.
